Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at Loomis/18th Street
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Blue Island, Ashland, Roosevelt & Racine, due to police activity near Loomis/18th Street.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Blue Island, Ashland, Roosevelt and Racine, due to police activity near Loomis/18th Street.

Allow extra travel time.
